name: OIL CHANGING
description: The 3,000 mile myth refers to a common belief, particularly in the United States, that all motor vehicles should have their motor oil changed at least every 3,000 miles (4,800 km) to maintain their car engine.

name: WASH AND GLASSING
description: Windex is much too harsh to use on the paint of your car, and it could cause some significant damage. When you clean glass with Windex, you will notice that it essentially strips the glass of any dirt, grime, or streaks.
